# Panel 2-2-2

```{r}
source("utils.R")
source("minimal_block222.R")
source("f_admissibleScenarios222.R")
source("test_contigous222.R")
source("panel222.R" )
```

```{r}
panel_prueba1 <- panel222(n_periods = 40)
prueba1 <- test_contigous222(panel_prueba1)
```


```{r}
panel_prueba2 <- panel222(n_periods = 40,  name_period = "quarter")
prueba2 <- test_contigous222(panel_prueba2)
```
